body:
Features and Enhancements

Competitive Dashboard
  • Market Penetration Graph
    • Added a new graph that displays Market Penetration for one or more networks.
    • Network selection options include individual networks, All project networks, All my networks, and All competitor networks.
    • Medical projects: Market Penetration graph presents a view of Hospital (Network and Market) and Individual Provider (Network and Market) counts plotted in one graph.
      • Y axis: Hospital
      • X axis: Individual Provider
    • Dental projects: Market Penetration graph presents a view of Specialist (Network and Market) and General Dentist (Network and Market) counts plotted in one graph.
      • Y axis: Specialist
      • X axis: General Dentist
    • Vision and Behavioral projects: Market Penetration graph presents a view of Individual Providers counts; there is no secondary graph element at this time.
      • Y axis: None
      • X axis: Individual
    • A table below the Market Penetration graph contains Penetration and Counts for all networks in the analysis criteria
    • The analysis can be executed with Provider, Provider Locations and Office counts.
    • The analysis is initially presented on the dashboard, and is also included in the Competitive Dashboard pdf export.
  • Export Network Counts
    • Add group by state option to Export Network Counts
